author: pallabidas
body:
#### PR description:

reviewed in https://github.com/cms-l1t-offline/cmssw/pull/1161 and https://github.com/cms-l1t-offline/cmssw/pull/1174

- adds a data format: l1tp2::Phase2L1CaloJetCollection
- depends on PR https://github.com/cms-l1t-offline/cmssw/pull/1069 for input GCT towers collection (ECAL clusters + HCAL towers)
- refer to presentation here: https://indico.cern.ch/event/1288569/timetable/?view=standard#68-calorimeter-trigger-firmwar
- not a backport
title: emulator for Phase-2 GCT calo jets and taus
